text: @realDonaldTrump WTF!!! THATS EXACTLY WHAT YOU DO!! Our FUTURE PRESIDENT in a few months, is smart, unlike YOU!! PRESIDENT JOE BIDEN is doing it correctly because of the coronavirus!! UNLIKE YOU!! YOU would LOVE it see it spread!! DUMBASS!!!!
